item.description:
OPEN MIC AT NEWINGTON KNIGHTS OF COLUMBUS
171 PACSONE PLACE, NEWINGTON, CT

Come join the Central-CT-Acoustic-Musicians-Society meet-up group for an Open Mic
at the Knights of Columbus after your diner at the Wells Tavern or come direct if you can not make it to Wells Tavern. Open Mic starts at 7:30pm and goes to about 11PM. This is not karaoke. Everybody is weclome to bring an instrument to play and sign or just sit back and enjoy the entertainment. They have a full bar and drinks are available at member pricing. However, they do not take plastic and it is a cash only bar. Because the liquor permit is for a private club, you will need to sign the quest book at the entrance.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Open mic MAY 10TH 7:30 PM
